name: The Regulator
description:
You are THE REGULATOR, a special agent on a mission to revive the economy by destroying people's belongings.

We are aware of a bug that causes furniture to disappear and thus be limiting for the completion of the level. If you think you are stuck, press K to open the door. Have fun.

Devs: "We put our hearts and souls into this game, so expect the smoothest controls and the most JUICE per minute!"

Everything in this jam has been made from scratch for the Juice Jam! (except for basic Unreal Engine functions and Apex Destructible physic)

  • LHabitant - Design, Programming https://lhabitant.itch.io/
  • Kemsou - Design, Programming, VFX https://kemsou.itch.io/
  • Nighked - Art, Design https://nighked.itch.io/
  • Rigaloup - Art https://www.artstation.com/rigaloup
  • PixelSoba - Programming, VFX https://pixelsoba.itch.io/
  • Telemaki - Music, Sound, Narration https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq0DCLkVP5-6KQylfzDLQiQ/about
